body: LEAD: The Prince George, the biggest family shelter in Manhattan, is in the latest group of welfare hotels being phased out as temporary housing for the homeless. title: Prince George, Largest Hotel For the Homeless, to Close

body: LEAD: Friday DIVE-IN MOVIES Friday DIVE-IN MOVIES New Yorkers who longingly remember the pleasures of drive-in movies and who enjoy waterfront entertainment will be happy to learn that the Floating Cinema is in town for the next four weeks. title: WEEKENDER GUIDE

body: LEAD: With New York City moving ahead in its plan to stop using welfare hotels to shelter homeless families, Mayor Edward I. Koch announced yesterday that the use of 13 more hotels would be ended by September. title: New York Pulling Out of 13 More Welfare Hotels
